Installing CrashPlan under FreeBSD 8 Lars Kellogg-Stedman
http://blog.oddbit.com/post/2011-05-22-installing-crashplan-under-freebsd-8/ 2011-05-22T00:00:00Z 2011-05-22T00:00:00Z This articles describes how I got CrashPlan running on my FreeBSD 8(-STABLE) system. These instructions by Kim Scarborough were my starting point, but as these were for FreeBSD 7 there were some additional steps necessary to get things working. Install Java I had originally thought that it might be possible to run the CrashPlan client “natively” under FreeBSD. CrashPlan is a Java application, so this seemed like a possible solution.
